description: This was my Grandmother's recipe and our family loves it. We hope your family will also enjoy this lovely slice.
name: Chocolate Hedgehog Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g marie biscuits, broken into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter, add sugar and then cocoa in a medium saucepan. When sugar is dissolved, add eggs and stir until thick. Don't let it boil.
Remove from stove. Add walnuts and biscuits. Stir until well combined.
Spray a slice tray 27cm x 16cm lightly with cooking spray and press into slice tin. Place in refrigerator to set.
Ice with chocolate icing and sprinkle with walnuts or coconut if desired.
